brandDNA.purposeQuestion: Why do we exist, beyond making money?
brandDNA.purposePlaceholder: E.g.: To make technology simple for everyone.
brandDNA.purposeHint: A single clear and concise sentence
brandDNA.visionQuestion: What future do we want to create?
brandDNA.visionPlaceholder: E.g.: A world where anyone can bring their digital ideas to life.
brandDNA.visionHint: An inspirational sentence about the future
brandDNA.missionQuestion: What do we do every day to achieve the vision?
brandDNA.missionPlaceholder: E.g.: We build the most intuitive software tools on the market.
brandDNA.missionHint: A concrete sentence about what you do
brandDNA.valuesQuestion: What do we believe in? What are our 3-5 core principles?
brandDNA.valueDescriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of what this value means for the company...
brandDNA.valueIconHint: An emoji to visually represent the value
brandDNA.noValues: No values added. Start by adding your company values.
brandDNA.minValuesHint: üí° At least 3 values recommended for a solid foundation
brandDNA.deleteValueConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this value?
brandDNA.toneQuestion: If we were a person, how would we speak?
brandDNA.toneDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe how you communicate with your customers. E.g.: 'We use clear and direct language, without jargon. We are professional but always approachable.'
